overview:
Daniel S. Dross is a Managing Partner of Trinity Hunt and serves on the Fund’s Investment Committee. He also currently serves on the boards of Rotorcraft Services Group and ShowPlex Cinemas. He previously served on the boards of DMX Music and NDEx.

Dan brings an exceptional business background to his role of overseeing the Fund’s deal origination, portfolio company monitoring, and the overall management, strategy and operations of Trinity Hunt. He was a founding partner of Thomas Weisel Capital Partners, a $1.3 billion private equity fund, from May 1999 to April 2002, where he oversaw major investments in the healthcare and media and communications sectors. He also worked at Hicks Muse as a principal, where he was responsible for managing more than $3 billion in transaction value. Prior to Hicks Muse, Dan served as a Vice President for the Dallas Investment Banking office of Prudential-Bache Securities.
